jobDescription:
• Architected and deployed a scalable AI audio production backend using Python (Flask), Docker, and Google Cloud Run; integrated OpenAI, ElevenLabs, and Google TTS APIs to automate narration and content generation. (Qiwi/Nodu)
  • Developed a streamlined internal tool with React, Tailwind, and Firebase, reducing AI audiobook production time by over 50% and significantly improving content creation workflows. (Qiwi/Nodu)
  • Engineered an innovative AI-powered video editing interface using React and Flask that translates natural language prompts into actionable video modifications, leveraging image and video generation models in fal.ai. (Qiwi/Nodu)
  • Implemented a complete payment system using Stripe and React.js to handle one-time credit purchases and introduce subscription plans for the AI video platform. (Qiwi/Nodu)
  • Engineered a comprehensive manual story creation and audio editing platform using Next.js and WebAudio APIs, enabling over 10,000 users to create and narrate stories. (MyLang)
  • Developed a scalable backend audio processing pipeline using AWS Lambda, Firebase Cloud Functions to automatically mix audio segments, suppress noise, and compress files into a final, high-quality track. This pipeline integrates with DRM vendors for content encryption and saving them to S3. (MyLang)
  • Engineered an advanced audio layering system using the WebAudio API to dynamically mix narration with background music and sound effects, featuring automated gain and fade controls. (MyLang)
  • Designed a comprehensive monetization platform, integrating the Cashfree payment gateway to enable premium content access through a digital coin system and drive revenue growth. (MyLang)

• Implemented the story creation module of Next.js webapp using WebAudio APIs, enabling 10,000+ users to write and narrate stories, with backend support through Firebase, AWS Lambda, S3, Firebase Cloud Functions and enabled secure transactions via Cash-Free payment gateway integration.
  • Implemented an AI-powered audiobook generation platform, leveraging Python, React.js, Postgresql, Google Cloud to convert books into immersive audiobooks with AI narration, background music, and sound effects. Increased book-to-audio conversion efficiency by 40% and reduced time to market by 90%.
